extendedInfo.description: jetAudio is a music player with Wide, Reverb, Bass Boost and 10/20 bands graphic equalizer.jetAudio for Windows is the highest rated and most downloaded media player on CNET.COM and, now you can listen to same high-quality sound on your Android phone using jetAudio.It plays almost any type of digital music files you have (.wav, .mp3, .ogg, .flac, .m4a, .mpc, .tta, .wv, .ape, .mod, .spx, .wma*, .mid** and more) and, it provides a very high quality sound with various effects and enhancements such as Wide, Reverb, X-Bass.It comes with 32 equalizer presets that will provide a wide array of listening experience. For those who would like to customize their own sound experience, it also allows 10/20 bands graphic equalizer and other advanced playback functions including playback speed control, crossfading, AGC and much more.Basic version provides same features with Plus version except advertisements and some features.To enjoy full features of jetAudio, please purchase Plus version.[ Features for Plus version only ]- 20-bands graphic equalizer- Display lyrics in tag (Unsynchronized lyrics)- 2 lock screens- 14 app widgets : 4x1 (#2), 4x2 (#3), 4x3 (#3), 4x4 (#3), 3x3, 2x2, 2x3- Pitch shifter- Last.fm (requires official Last.fm app)- Precise playback speed control (50% ~ 200%)- Light Gray/White theme for browser (Plus only)- Grid mode for Artist/Song/Folder/Genre browser- Adjust FF/REW interval- Expanded notification bar (for JB)- MIDI playback (using jetAudio WaveTable MIDI synthesizer engine)**[ Features for Basic/Plus version ]- Can choose between List or 10 Grid modes for layout style- X-Wide, Reverb, X-Bass sound effects- AGC (automatic gain control) to avoid volume fluctuations between tracks- Speed control from 50% to 200% (pitch adjusted)- Crossfading, Gap-less playback- Fade-in/Fade-out - Browser and play music by artits, albums, songs, playlists, genres and folders- Balance/Volume control- Sleep timer up to 24 hours- Flick up to post what you're listening to on Facebook/Twitter- Flick down to show Now Playing- Flick left/right to play next/previous- Lock screens- Repeat A<->B- Headset button control  - press to pause/resume  - double/triple press to play next/prev  - long press to mute or TTS (time, title)- Multi-select function (Delete/Add to playlist)- Keep screen on, Lock orientation options- Shake to play next/previous track- Supporting formats:  MP3, WAV, OGG, FLAC, M4A, MPC, TTA, WV, APE, MOD (module formats S3M, IT), SPX, AIFF, WMA*, MID**(WMA may not be supported on some devices. Please check your device specification for WMA support)*(If you want to localize jetAudio for your language, please contact jetaudio@jetappfactory.com for more information)

reviews.title: Great Audio Player!
reviews.comment: One of the best audio players I\'ve used...I use to love Winamp but this player here is amazing.
reviews.author: hycrin

reviews.title: Fix ID Tags
reviews.comment: Would like to be able to fix ID tags and then the music player would be 100% perfect.
reviews.author: Vivian Corbiere

reviews.title: EQ?
reviews.comment: The EQ is horrible! Uninstalled.
reviews.author: Zachary Shepherd

reviews.title: I love this  but......
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried just about every music player out there and this one is one of the best. The only things I need changed to make it perfect (and five stars) is for there to be a slider added to the widget so I can go back at whatever point in the song I want to. Also, I want to be able to change the layout of the playlists like I can for everything else.
reviews.author: Yolonda Hughes

reviews.comment: Constantly specifying it should handle music files became too much, uninstalled\tThe program works fine, except it always needs to be told constantly to be the default application to handle music files constantly. Happens even without new updates and is especially annoying because need to re specify for each level of song browsing (browse by artist, alblum, etc...).
reviews.author: Bevan Ernst

reviews.title: Cream of the Crop
reviews.comment: This player went under my radar for a long time. I have evaluated several music apps and assumed Poweramp would always be my default player.  Recently, I re-down loaded jetAudio and discovered this program is excellent and equal in ability to any \"high-end\" player on the market. My only request for improvement is the ability to edit metadata files (similar to Poweramp) and add \'surround effects\' ( like the Maven Player).  Throw in A rating system for individual songs and jetAudio would be almost perfect!
reviews.author: John Craig

reviews.title: My choice of audio player
reviews.comment: jetAudio Plus is the best audio player I tried (along with PlayerPro and PowerAmp, two of the top players available to Android) and I tell you why:  * 20-set equalizer with preamp.  * Sound effects to boost bass, widen the stereo image (both with three groups), and setting for Hall, Room, Stage or Stadium.  * AGC (Automatic Gain Control) setting to bring the loudness of your songs to a more even level.  * Four different user categories - so you can easily apply different settings to various music.  * You can control the speed of your music.  * Choose a starting (A) and end (B) point in a song and then repeat just that part.  * Choose between several pictures before downloading missing album art.  * Timer to stop or start playback so you can fall asleep or wake up with music.  * While you play a song you can click on a button which gives you options to find the song on Youtube, share it via Bluetooth or email, or post it on Twitter or Facebook.  jetAudio has still other features but this presentation is already way too long, but it\'s such a well-crafted app that I wanted to motivate the 5 stars I\'m giving to it and encourage others to give a try to this excellent audio player.
reviews.author: Damienn Danataus

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I really love this app. Again my only peeve is that there is no option to select the folder you want listed for albums as folders for music samples from MPA, Caustic and APC show up under albums..For people trippin about the eq, you could always use a third party eq..I still say keep up the good work!!
reviews.author: Maurice Truitt

reviews.title: You like music.  This tool is for you.
reviews.comment: Great tool.  Works!
reviews.author: Luis Morales

reviews.title: Very very good
reviews.comment: An excellent app for audio file
reviews.author: zack Hamdali

reviews.title: Best
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried them all. This is the only one I\'ve found worth keeping. Love it!
reviews.author: Lee Jones

reviews.title: Excellent.
reviews.comment: Love it very much.
reviews.author: Pavel Kozadaev

reviews.title: Ok.
reviews.comment: Separates some albums into two when it should not. Does properly separate greatest hits albums, which makes me happy. Needs updated lock screen. ICS lock screen does not work.
reviews.author: Jason Crumbley

reviews.title: Not all features working
reviews.comment: The double press and triple press does not seems to work on canvas. 4 (android 4.2) used to work on Motorola defy xt (android 2.3).  Rest all features are work fine.
reviews.author: Alok Dutt

reviews.title: Accurate sound
reviews.comment: Sound is not colored like many players out there.  If you have quality headphones you will appreciate the accurate sound.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Please ADD
reviews.comment: Would love to be able to Fix and edit messed up ID tags...
reviews.author: Daren Wellings

reviews.title: Best music player
reviews.comment: It produces safest sound for the ears. Best music player which has perfect blend of all the bands in a music.
reviews.author: Sharanappa Hunagundi

reviews.title: Been using this for years now its just great.
reviews.comment: Great

reviews.title: Best of Best
reviews.comment: the most excellent music player for Android that I\'ve ever seen.
reviews.author: dsaa ewrgwewef

reviews.title: Jetaudio are the bomb!!
reviews.comment: Always used their player for PC and now android. Its the best hands down! Only small problem it has it when it lowers the volume for a notification, its almost a little too long of a drop. Other than that, nothing is like it :)
reviews.author: Will Palmer
